content:
The avalanche style attack is not how equivocations are counted in the beacon chain. It instead formalizes an obvious but very bas flaw in that way of counting

The latter did lead to a patch in the spec because in some attacker models when no finality, views can be split (and thus balanced)

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2845
